title: The Last Frontier
content: Chena Hot SpringIn Alaska, the land of always winter, warm steam are rising up in a small town an hour away drive from the city of Fairbanks. It was at Chena Hot Springs. Two strangers were casually walking around the resort, shooting breaktaking photos of the winter scene. Rosemary approached Steven,  ‘Could you take a photo of me over here with my camera?’   Rosemary Photo by Steven and Rosemary, our first portrait photo for each otherLeverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews.
